# Function: SwitchTeams()

```ts
function SwitchTeams(teamA, teamB): void;
```

Defined in: [mod/index.d.ts:20440](https://github.com/battlefield-portal-community/portal-docs/blob/e47049b63e51188248b798c13df021a40e9a89fc/generators/santiago/mod/index.d.ts#L20440)

Switches players on TeamA and TeamB. Both teams must have the same Human and Bot count.
